00016 /*!\fn void *thread_pool_processing_function( void *param )
00017  * \brief Internal thread pool processing function
00018  * \param param Teh eventual param of a process
00019  * \return NULL when exiting
00020  */
00021 void *thread_pool_processing_function( void *param )
00022 {
00023                 THREAD_POOL_NODE *node = (THREAD_POOL_NODE *)param ;
00024 
00025                 int thread_state = 0 ;
00026 
00027                 pthread_detach( pthread_self() );
00028 
00029                 pthread_mutex_lock( &node -> global_lock );
00030 
00031                 do
00032                 {
00033                                 n_log( LOG_DEBUG , "Thread pool processing func waiting" );
00034                                 /* Direct procs automatically post th_start */
00035                                 sem_wait( &node -> th_start ); 
00036 
00037                                 pthread_mutex_lock( &node -> lock );
00038                                 thread_state = node -> thread_state ;
00039                                 pthread_mutex_unlock( &node -> lock );
00040 
00041                                 n_log( LOG_DEBUG , "Thread pool process started with state %d" , thread_state );
00042 
00043                                 if( thread_state != EXITING_THREAD )
00044                                 {
00045                                                 n_log( LOG_DEBUG , "Thread pool running proc %p" , node -> func );
00046 
00047                                                 pthread_mutex_lock( &node -> lock );
00048                                                 node -> state = RUNNING_PROC ;
00049                                                 pthread_mutex_unlock( &node -> lock );
00050 
00051                                                 if( node && node -> func )
00052                                                 {
00053                                                                 if( node -> param )
00054                                                                                 node -> func( node -> param ) ;
00055                                                                 else
00056                                                                                 node -> func( NULL );
00057                                                 }
00058                                                 n_log( LOG_DEBUG , "Thread pool end proc %p" , node -> func );
00059 
00060                                                 pthread_mutex_lock( &node -> lock );
00061                                                 node -> func = NULL ;
00062                                                 node -> param = NULL ;
00063                                                 
00064                                                 node -> state = IDLE_PROC ;
00065 
00066                                                 int type = node -> type ;
00067                                                 node -> type = -1 ; 
00068                                                 pthread_mutex_unlock( &node -> lock );
00069 
00070                                                 /* DIRECT_PROC do not need to post th_end */
00071                                                 if( type&SYNCED_PROC )
00072                                                                 sem_post( &node -> th_end );
00073                                 }
00074 
00075                 }while( thread_state != EXITING_THREAD );
00076 
00077                 n_log( LOG_NOTICE , "Thread processing func %ld exiting" , node -> thr );
00078 
00079                 pthread_mutex_lock( &node -> lock );
00080                 node -> thread_state = EXITED_THREAD ;
00081                 pthread_mutex_unlock( &node -> lock );
00082 
00083                 n_log( LOG_NOTICE , "Thread %ld exited" , node -> thr );
00084 
00085                 pthread_mutex_unlock( &node -> global_lock );
00086 
00087                 pthread_exit( NULL );
00088 
00089 #ifndef SOLARIS
00090                 return NULL ;
00091 #endif
00092 
00093 } /* thread_pool_processing_function */

00097 /*!\fn THREAD_POOL *new_thread_pool( int nbmaxthr , int nb_max_waiting )
00098  * \brief Create a new pool of nbmaxthr threads
00099  * \param nbmaxthr number of active threads in the pool
00100  * \param nb_max_waiting max number of waiting procs in the pool
00101  * \return NULL or a new trhead pool object
00102  */
00103 THREAD_POOL *new_thread_pool( int nbmaxthr , int nb_max_waiting )
00104 {
00105                 THREAD_POOL *thread_pool = NULL ;
00106 
00107                 Malloc( thread_pool , THREAD_POOL , 1 );
00108                 if( !thread_pool )
00109                                 return NULL ;
00110 
00111                 thread_pool -> max_threads = nbmaxthr ;
00112                 thread_pool -> nb_max_waiting = nb_max_waiting ;
00113                 thread_pool -> nb_actives = 0 ;
00114 
00115                 thread_pool -> thread_list =  (THREAD_POOL_NODE **)malloc( nbmaxthr * sizeof( THREAD_POOL_NODE * ) );
00116                 if( !thread_pool -> thread_list )
00117                 {
00118                                 Free( thread_pool );
00119                                 return NULL ;
00120                 }
00121 
00122                 thread_pool -> waiting_list = new_generic_list( 0 );
00123                 if( !thread_pool -> waiting_list )
00124                 {
00125                                 n_log( LOG_ERR , "Unable to initialize wait list" );
00126                                 return NULL ;
00127                 }
00128 
00129                 pthread_mutex_init( &thread_pool -> lock , NULL );
00130 
00131                 for( int it = 0 ; it < nbmaxthr ; it ++ )
00132                 {
00133                                 Malloc( thread_pool -> thread_list[ it ] , THREAD_POOL_NODE , 1 );
00134                                 thread_pool -> thread_list[ it ] -> type = -1 ;
00135                                 thread_pool -> thread_list[ it ] -> state = IDLE_PROC ;
00136                                 thread_pool -> thread_list[ it ] -> thread_state = RUNNING_THREAD ;
00137 
00138                                 if( sem_init( &thread_pool -> thread_list[ it ] -> th_start , 0 , 0 ) == -1 )
00139                                 {
00140                                                 n_log( LOG_ERR , "sem_init failed : %s on &thread_pool -> thread_list[ %d ] -> th_start\n" , strerror ( errno ) , it );
00141                                                 return NULL;
00142                                 }
00143                                 if( sem_init( &thread_pool -> thread_list[ it ] -> th_end   , 0 , 0 ) == -1 )
00144                                 {
00145                                                 n_log( LOG_ERR , "sem_init failed : %s on &thread_pool -> thread_list[ %d] -> th_end\n" , strerror ( errno ) , it );
00146                                                 return NULL;
00147                                 }
00148 
00149                                 thread_pool -> thread_list[ it ] -> func = NULL ;
00150                                 thread_pool -> thread_list[ it ] -> param = NULL ;
00151 
00152                                 pthread_mutex_init( &thread_pool -> thread_list[ it ] -> lock , NULL );
00153                                 pthread_mutex_init( &thread_pool -> thread_list[ it ] -> global_lock , NULL );
00154 
00155                                 if( pthread_create( &thread_pool -> thread_list[ it ] -> thr , NULL, thread_pool_processing_function , (void *)thread_pool -> thread_list[ it ] ) != 0 )
00156                                 {
00157                                                 n_log( LOG_ERR , "pthread_create failed : %s for it %d\n" ,  strerror ( errno ) , it );
00158                                                 return NULL;
00159                                 }
00160                 }
00161                 return thread_pool ;
00162 }

00167 /*!\fn int add_threaded_process( THREAD_POOL *thread_pool , void *(*func_ptr)(void *param) , void *param , int mode )
00168  *\brief add a function and params to a thread pool
00169  *\param thread_pool The target thread pool  
00170  *\param func_ptr The function pointer to launch
00171  *\param param Eventual parameter struct to pass to the function
00172  *\param mode SYNCED_PROC: added to pool, but wait for a start call with other waiting procs. DIRECT_PROC: the function actually starts as quick as possible
00173  *\return TRUE or FALSE 
00174  */
00175 int add_threaded_process( THREAD_POOL *thread_pool , void *(*func_ptr)(void *param) , void *param ,  int mode )
00176 {
00177 
00178 if( !thread_pool )
00179                 return FALSE ;
00180 
00181 if( !thread_pool -> thread_list )
00182                 return FALSE ;
00183 
00184 int it = 0 ;
00185 while( it < thread_pool -> max_threads )
00186 {
00187                 pthread_mutex_lock( &thread_pool -> thread_list[ it ] -> lock );
00188                 if( thread_pool -> thread_list[ it ] -> thread_state == RUNNING_THREAD && thread_pool -> thread_list[ it ] -> state == IDLE_PROC )
00189                 {
00190                                 pthread_mutex_unlock( &thread_pool -> thread_list[ it ] -> lock );
00191                                 break ;
00192                 }
00193                 pthread_mutex_unlock( &thread_pool -> thread_list[ it ] -> lock );
00194                 it ++ ;
00195 }
00196 if( it >= thread_pool -> max_threads )
00197 {
00198                 /* if already coming from queue, or if it should be part of a synced start, do not re-add && return FALSE  */
00199                 if( mode&NOQUEUE || mode&SYNCED_PROC )
00200                 {
00201                                 return FALSE ;
00202                 }
00203                 if( thread_pool -> waiting_list -> nb_items < thread_pool -> nb_max_waiting ) 
00204                 {
00205                                 THREAD_WAITING_PROC *proc = NULL ;
00206                                 Malloc( proc , THREAD_WAITING_PROC , 1 );
00207                                 proc -> func = func_ptr ;
00208                                 proc -> param = param ;
00209                                 pthread_mutex_lock( &thread_pool -> lock );
00210                                 list_push( thread_pool -> waiting_list , proc , free );
00211                                                 n_log( LOG_DEBUG , "Adding %p %p to waitlist" , proc -> func , proc -> param );
00212                                                 pthread_mutex_unlock( &thread_pool -> lock );
00213                                                 return TRUE ;
00214                                 }
00215                                 else
00216                                 {
00217                                                 n_log( LOG_DEBUG , "Proc %p %p was dropped from waitlist because waitlist is full" , func_ptr , param );
00218                                                 return FALSE ;
00219                                 }
00220                 }
00221                                 
00222                 pthread_mutex_lock( &thread_pool -> thread_list[ it ] -> lock );
00223                 if( mode&DIRECT_PROC )
00224                 {
00225                                 thread_pool -> thread_list[ it ] -> func = func_ptr ;
00226                                 thread_pool -> thread_list[ it ] -> param = param ;
00227                                 thread_pool -> thread_list[ it ] -> state = WAITING_PROC ;
00228                                 thread_pool -> thread_list[ it ] -> type = mode ;
00229                                 sem_post( &thread_pool -> thread_list[ it ] -> th_start );
00230                 }
00231                 else if( mode&SYNCED_PROC )
00232                 {
00233                                 thread_pool -> thread_list[ it ] -> func = func_ptr ;
00234                                 thread_pool -> thread_list[ it ] -> param = param ;
00235                                 thread_pool -> thread_list[ it ] -> state = WAITING_PROC ;
00236                                 thread_pool -> thread_list[ it ] -> type = mode ;
00237                 }
00238                 else
00239                 {
00240                                 n_log( LOG_ERR , "Unknown mode %d for thread %d" , mode , it );
00241                                 pthread_mutex_unlock( &thread_pool -> thread_list[ it ] -> lock );
00242                                 return FALSE ;
00243                 }
00244                 pthread_mutex_unlock( &thread_pool -> thread_list[ it ] -> lock );
00245                 return TRUE ;
00246 }

00250 /*!\fn int start_threaded_pool( THREAD_POOL *thread_pool )
00251  * \brief Launch the process waiting for exectution in the thread pool
00252  * \param thread_pool The thread pool to launche
00253  * \return TRUE or FALSE
00254  */
00255 int start_threaded_pool( THREAD_POOL *thread_pool )
00256 {
00257                 if( !thread_pool )
00258                                 return FALSE ;
00259 
00260                 if( !thread_pool -> thread_list )
00261                                 return FALSE ;
00262 
00263                 int retval = TRUE ;   
00264 
00265                 for( int it = 0 ; it < thread_pool -> max_threads ; it ++ )
00266                 {
00267                                 int to_run = 0 ;
00268                                 pthread_mutex_lock( &thread_pool -> thread_list[ it ] -> lock );
00269                                 if( (thread_pool -> thread_list[ it ] -> type&SYNCED_PROC) && thread_pool -> thread_list[ it ] -> state == WAITING_PROC )
00270                                 {
00271                                                 to_run = 1 ;
00272                                 }
00273                                 pthread_mutex_unlock( &thread_pool -> thread_list[ it ] -> lock );
00274                                 if( to_run == 1 )
00275                                 {
00276                                                 if( sem_post( &thread_pool -> thread_list[ it ] -> th_start ) != 0 )
00277                                                 {
00278 
00279                                                 }   retval = FALSE ;
00280                                 }
00281                 }
00282                 return retval ;
00283 }

00287 /*!\fn int wait_for_threaded_pool( THREAD_POOL *thread_pool , int delay )
00288  * \brief Wait for all the launched process in the thread pool to terminate
00289  * \param thread_pool The thread pool to wait
00290  * \param delay time between each check
00291  * \return TRUE or FALSE
00292  */
00293 int wait_for_threaded_pool(  THREAD_POOL *thread_pool , int delay )
00294 {
00295                 if( !thread_pool )
00296                                 return FALSE ;
00297 
00298                 if( !thread_pool -> thread_list )
00299                                 return FALSE ;
00300 
00301                 int DONE = 0 ;
00302 
00303                 while( thread_pool -> waiting_list -> nb_items > 0 )
00304                 {
00305                                 refresh_thread_pool( thread_pool );
00306                                 u_sleep( delay );
00307                 }
00308 
00309                 while( !DONE )
00310                 {
00311                                 refresh_thread_pool( thread_pool );
00312                                 DONE = 1 ;
00313                                 for( int it = 0 ; it < thread_pool -> max_threads ; it ++ )
00314                                 {
00315                                                 int state = 0 ;
00316 
00317                                                 pthread_mutex_lock( &thread_pool -> thread_list[ it ] -> lock );
00318                                                 state = thread_pool -> thread_list[ it ] -> state ;
00319                                                 pthread_mutex_unlock( &thread_pool -> thread_list[ it ] -> lock );
00320                                                 if( !(state&IDLE_PROC) )
00321                                                 {
00322                                                                 DONE = 0 ;
00323                                                                 /* n_log( LOG_DEBUG , "Thread id %d status is not IDLE: %d" , it , state ); */
00324                                                 }  
00325                                 }
00326                                 u_sleep( delay );
00327                 }
00328                 return TRUE ;
00329 }

00332 /*!\fn int destroy_threaded_pool( THREAD_POOL **pool  ,int delay )
00333  * \brief delete a thread_pool, exit the threads and free the structs
00334  * \param pool The THREAD_POOL *object to kill
00335  * \param delay The THREAD_POOL *object to kill
00336  * \return TRUE or FALSE 
00337  */
00338 int destroy_threaded_pool( THREAD_POOL **pool , int delay )
00339 {
00340                 __n_assert( (*pool)  , return FALSE );
00341                 __n_assert( (*pool) -> thread_list  , return FALSE );
00342 
00343                 int state= 0 , DONE = 0 ;
00344 
00345                 while( !DONE )
00346                 {
00347                                 DONE = 0 ;
00348                                 for( int it = 0 ; it < (*pool) -> max_threads ; it ++ )
00349                                 {
00350                                                 pthread_mutex_lock( &(*pool) -> thread_list[ it ] -> lock );
00351                                                 state = (*pool) -> thread_list[ it ] -> state ;     
00352                                                 pthread_mutex_unlock( &(*pool) -> thread_list[ it ] -> lock );
00353 
00354                                                 if( state == IDLE_PROC )
00355                                                 {
00356                                                                 n_log( LOG_DEBUG , "Posting EXITING to thread %ld" , (*pool) -> thread_list[ it ] -> thr  );
00357                                                                 pthread_mutex_lock( &(*pool) -> thread_list[ it ] -> lock );
00358                                                                 (*pool) -> thread_list[ it ] -> thread_state = EXITING_THREAD ;     
00359                                                                 sem_post( &(*pool) -> thread_list[ it ] -> th_start );
00360                                                                 pthread_mutex_unlock( &(*pool) -> thread_list[ it ] -> lock );
00361                                                                 DONE = 1 ;
00362                                                 }
00363                                                 else
00364                                                 {
00365                                                                 n_log( LOG_DEBUG , "thr %ld proc state %d thr state %d" , (*pool) -> thread_list[ it ] -> thr ,  (*pool) -> thread_list[ it ] -> state ,(*pool) -> thread_list[ it ] -> thread_state  );
00366                                                 }
00367 
00368                                                 pthread_mutex_lock(   &(*pool) -> thread_list[ it ] -> global_lock );
00369                                                 pthread_mutex_unlock( &(*pool) -> thread_list[ it ] -> global_lock );
00370 
00371                                 }
00372                                 u_sleep( delay );
00373                 }
00374 
00375                 for( int it = 0 ; it < (*pool) -> max_threads ; it ++ )
00376                 {
00377                                 pthread_mutex_destroy( &(*pool) -> thread_list[ it ] -> lock );
00378                                 pthread_mutex_destroy( &(*pool) -> thread_list[ it ] -> global_lock );
00379                                 sem_destroy(  &(*pool) -> thread_list[ it ] -> th_start );
00380                                 sem_destroy(  &(*pool) -> thread_list[ it ] -> th_end );
00381                                 Free( (*pool) -> thread_list[ it ] );
00382                 }
00383                 Free( (*pool) -> thread_list );
00384 
00385 
00386                 pthread_mutex_lock( &(*pool) -> lock );
00387                 list_destroy(  &(*pool) -> waiting_list );
00388                 pthread_mutex_unlock( &(*pool) -> lock );
00389                 
00390                 pthread_mutex_destroy( &(*pool) -> lock );
00391 
00392                 Free( (*pool) );
00393 
00394                 return TRUE ;
00395 } /* destroy_threaded_pool */

00400 /*!\fn  int refresh_thread_pool( THREAD_POOL *thread_pool )
00401  * \brief try to add some waiting DIRECT_PROCs on some free thread slots, else do nothing 
00402  * \param thread_pool The thread pool to refresh
00403  * \return TRUE or FALSE
00404  */ 
00405 int refresh_thread_pool( THREAD_POOL *thread_pool )
00406 {
00407                 /* Trying to empty the wait list */
00408                 int push_status = 0 ;
00409 
00410                 __n_assert( thread_pool , return FALSE );
00411                 __n_assert( thread_pool -> waiting_list , return FALSE );
00412 
00413                 pthread_mutex_lock( &thread_pool -> lock );
00414 
00415                 if( thread_pool -> waiting_list && thread_pool -> waiting_list -> start )
00416                                 push_status = 1 ;
00417 
00418                 while( push_status == 1 )
00419                 {
00420                                 LIST_NODE *node = thread_pool -> waiting_list -> start ;
00421                                 LIST_NODE *next_node = NULL ;
00422                                 if( node && node -> ptr )
00423                                 {
00424                                                 THREAD_WAITING_PROC *proc = (THREAD_WAITING_PROC *)node -> ptr ;
00425                                                 if( proc )
00426                                                 {
00427                                                                 if( add_threaded_process( thread_pool , proc -> func , proc -> param , DIRECT_PROC|NOQUEUE ) == TRUE )
00428                                                                 {
00429                                                                                 THREAD_WAITING_PROC *procptr = NULL ;
00430                                                                                 next_node = node -> next ;
00431                                                                                 procptr = remove_list_node( thread_pool -> waiting_list , node , THREAD_WAITING_PROC );
00432                                                                                 n_log( LOG_DEBUG , "Adding %p %p from waitlist" , procptr -> func , procptr -> param );
00433                                                                                 Free( proc );
00434                                                                                 node = next_node ;
00435                                                                 }
00436                                                                 else
00437                                                                 {
00438                                                                                 push_status = 0 ;
00439                                                                 }
00440                                                 }
00441                                 }
00442                                 else
00443                                 {
00444                                                 push_status = 0 ;
00445                                 }
00446                 } /* while( push_status == 1 ) */
00447                 pthread_mutex_unlock( &thread_pool -> lock );
00448 
00449                 /* update statictics */
00450                 thread_pool -> nb_actives = 0 ;
00451                 for( int it = 0 ; it < thread_pool -> max_threads ; it ++ )
00452                 {
00453                                 pthread_mutex_lock( &thread_pool -> thread_list[ it ] -> lock );
00454                                 if( thread_pool -> thread_list[ it ] -> state == RUNNING_PROC )
00455                                                 thread_pool -> nb_actives ++ ;     
00456                                 pthread_mutex_unlock( &thread_pool -> thread_list[ it ] -> lock );
00457                 }
00458 
00459 
00460                 return TRUE ;
00461 } /* refresh_thread_pool() */
